name: HaikuReader
0:
”Alexa, ask Haiku Reader for a haiku.”
”Alexa, tell Haiku Reader to read me a poem.”
”Alexa, tell Haiku Reader to read me something.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: haiku reader
des: Haiku Reader is a skill that will read out a random haiku when asked. A haiku is a Japanese poem containing three lines. The first and third line have 5 syllables, while the second line has 7 syllables. Fun will ensue when you ask Haiku Reader for a haiku!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
